meanings.definition: a person who arranges matters or repairs things
meanings.sent1: The fixer quickly repaired the broken chair in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: My dad is a fixer who can solve any problem around the house.
meanings.sent3: The fixer tried to fix the leaky faucet but ended up making it worse!
meanings.sent4: She was like a fixer in our group, always putting things back together when they fell apart.
meanings.sent5: The fixer's toolbox was filled with all the tools needed to fix anything.

meanings.definition: a substance used for fixing something in place
meanings.sent1: I used the fixer to glue the broken pieces of the vase back together.
meanings.sent2: The fixer held the wallpaper firmly on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The fixer spilled all over the table, making it stick to everything!
meanings.sent4: The fixer acted like magic, keeping the pieces together as if they were never broken.
meanings.sent5: The fixer's strong adhesive properties made it perfect for the job.

meanings.definition: a person who makes arrangements for others, especially in a professional capacity
meanings.sent1: The fixer organized the entire event, from start to finish.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the fixer in the office for her ability to handle any situation.
meanings.sent3: The fixer planned a surprise party that left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: He was the fixer behind the scenes, ensuring everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The fixer's attention to detail made every event a success.
